text: Map showing the distribution of the national parks in Spain The National Parks of Spain are set out in the following table in alphabetical order. They are defined under Spanish Law 41/1997, which established a new model of shared management of the national parks between the National and the Regional Governments. Links are to the corresponding web site of the Ministry of Agriculture, Food and Environment of Spain, and are in Spanish.Red de Parques Nacionales (National Parks of Spain) — index for all the national parks' links. ==National parks== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="width:100%; font-size:89%; margin-top:0.5em;" |- valign="middle" ! Cuenca del Guadarrama in the westernmost part of the park area in Madrid. * Cuenca del río Manzanares (ES3110004),Natura 2000 Data Sheet - Cuenca del río Manzanares encompassing the main part of the park area in Madrid. * Cuenca del río Lozoya y Sierra Norte (ES3110002),Natura 2000 Data Sheet - Cuenca del río Lozoya y Sierra Norte in the easternmost part of the park area in Madrid. * Lugar de importancia comunitario de Sierra de Guadarrama (ES4160109).Natura 2000 Data Sheet - Sierra de Guadarrama It encompasses the park area in Segovia. | Sierra de Guadarrama | |- | Atlantic Islands of Galicia | 175px | A Coruña & Pontevedra | Galicia | 2002 | Atlantic Islands of Galicia National Park is split among the following sites of community importance: * Cíes Islands, in the province of Pontevedra (ES0000001).Natura 2000 Data Sheet - Picos de Europa (Asturias) It encompasses the park territory in Asturias. * Liébana site of community importance, in Cantabria (ES1300001).Natura 2000 Data Sheet - Liébana It encompasses the park area in Cantabria. * Picos de Europa site of community importance, in the province of León. (ES0000003).Natura 2000 Data Sheet - Picos de Europa It encompasses almost the whole park area in León. * Picos de Europa en Castilla y León site of community importance (ES4130003).Natura 2000 Data Sheet - Picos de Europa en Castilla y León It encompasses a small part of the park territory in León, next to Cantabria. | | |- | Sierra Nevada | 175px | Granada, Almería | Andalusia | 1999 | It is inside the Sierra Nevada site of community importance (ES6140004).Natura 2000 Data Sheet - Sierra Nevada | Sierra Nevada (Spain) | |- | Tablas de Daimiel | 175px | Ciudad Real | Castile-La Mancha | 1973 | Almost the same as designated Tablas de Daimiel site of community importance (ES0000013).Natura 2000 Data Sheet - Tablas de Daimiel | Tablas de Daimiel | |- | Teide | 175px | Santa Cruz de Tenerife (Tenerife island) | Canary Islands | 1954 | Almost the same as designated Teide site of community importance (ES7020043).Ficha Natura 2000 del Parque nacional del Teide | Parque nacional del Teide | |- | Timanfaya | 175px | Las Palmas (Lanzarote island) | Canary Islands | 1974 | Almost the same as designated Timanfaya site of community importance (ES0000141).Ficha Natura 2000 del Parque nacional de Timanfaya | Parque Nacional de Timanfaya | |} ==See also== * List of national parks of Spain == References == 02 Spain National parks .National parks
title: List of national parks of Spain and their relationship to sites of community importance
